summary: A website for downloading videos from Instagram and Facebook without watermarks
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero background image with abstract gradient pattern suitable for a video downloader app (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Social media icon representing video download concept (download-icon.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a frontend interface with input fields for Instagram and Facebook video URLs, allowing users to paste video links they want to download
Provide download functionality that allows users to save the processed videos to their local device

Design a modern, visually distinct interface with a creative color scheme (avoiding blue and purple), clear typography, and an intuitive layout that emphasizes simplicity and ease of use for video downloading

new_feature_requests.summary: Download videos from Instagram without watermark
Download videos from Facebook without watermark
Implement backend functionality to fetch and process Instagram video content from provided URLs, extracting the video file without watermarks
Implement backend functionality to fetch and process Facebook video content from provided URLs, extracting the video file without watermarks
